column4: Ack, the two mysql dump commands I found aren't working because /var/lib is gone.  :(  i tried: "mysqldump" and "mysqlhotcopy"
Your problem looks similar to what I went through a few weeks ago, but I missed your initial description of the problem. What did you run into?
I deleted my /var/lib directory... not fun.  So, since I can't rebuild it, that I know of, I'm trying to backup mysql to do a restore of the server (test/non-production server)
I believe /var/lib/mysql is where mysql stores its databases. If you deleted that I don't think you have much left to back up.
